resources.string: Traditional Chinese Resource Pack For Toolbox
This project is open source to GitHub
Added Traditional Chinese to your Toolbox mod\n\nPlease click the button below to install the Resource Pack, after finishing, start the Toolbox and apply it in the "Settings> Global Resource Pack".
Download the "Traditional Chinese Resource Pack For Toolbox" at once, so that your "Toolbox mod" has a Traditional Chinese language!
You do not have Toolbox installed. Please download it on Google Play!
Open Toolbox, go to "Settings> Global Resource Pack" to apply within Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack.
Please help this APP rated 5 stars, thank you OuO
No internet connection, please check your network status
Please start the Toolbox and apply the Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack to the "Settings > Global Resource Pack"!

Although you skip ad (ad is our revenue source), but we still allows you to install success, please start the Toolbox and apply the Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack to the "Settings > Global Resource Pack"!

No network can not load ad (ad is our revenue source), but we still allows you to install success, please start the Toolbox and apply the Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack to the "Settings > Global Resource Pack"!
Are you sure you want to delete the "Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack"?
You have not finished watching ad, unable to install "Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack".
The system detects that your device block the ad, ad is our source of income to sustain the operation of the service, turn off the ad block and restart the App.
You do not install "Line", if you want to go to Google Play installation?
